languages.text: {n}Кибелла стискивает трясущиеся руки в кулаки, стараясь унять постыдную дрожь.{/n} "Висирь говорил нам: умерев лишь раз, вы не познаете истины. И мы умирали множество раз... Мы так думали. Но то была ложь. Самообман. Мы никогда не отправлялись на другую сторону по-настоящему. А здесь..."

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла стискивает трясущиеся руки в кулаки, стараясь унять постыдную дрожь.{/n} "Висирь говорил нам: умерев лишь раз, вы не познаете истины. И мы умирали множество раз... Мы так думали. Но то была ложь. Самообман. Мы никогда не отправлялись на другую сторону по-настоящему. А здесь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists, trying to kill the shameful tremor.{/n} "The Vizsier told us: you cannot learn the truth by dying only once. So we died many times... That's what we thought. But it was a lie. A delusion. We would never truly go to the other side. But here..."

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists, trying to kill the shameful tremor.{/n} "The Vizsier told us: you cannot learn the truth by dying only once. So we died many times... That's what we thought. But it was a lie. A delusion. We would never truly go to the other side. But here..."

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

{n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

languages.text: {n}Kibellah aprieta los puños para contener su temblor.{/n} «El Visir nos dijo que hemos de morir muchas veces para descubrir la verdad. Le creímos. Perecimos una y otra vez, y otra... Pero todo era mentira. Un delirio. Jamás vimos el otro lado. Pero aquí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah aprieta los puños para contener su temblor.{/n} «El Visir nos dijo que hemos de morir muchas veces para descubrir la verdad. Le creímos. Perecimos una y otra vez, y otra... Pero todo era mentira. Un delirio. Jamás vimos el otro lado. Pero aquí...».

languages.text: {n}震えさせないようにと、キベラは拳を握り締める。{/n}「ヴィジールは、真実を知るには繰り返し死ななければならないと言ったわ。私たちはそれを信じた。何度も何度も死んで…でも、それはすべて嘘だった。妄想だった。本当にあちら側に行くことはなかった。でも、ここは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

traits.locale_text: {n}震えさせないようにと、キベラは拳を握り締める。{/n}「ヴィジールは、真実を知るには繰り返し死ななければならないと言ったわ。私たちはそれを信じた。何度も何度も死んで…でも、それはすべて嘘だった。妄想だった。本当にあちら側に行くことはなかった。でも、ここは…」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈紧紧握住了颤抖的拳头。{/n}“宿老告诉我们，说我们必须死亡很多次，才能找到真理。我们相信了他的话，我们一次又一次迎接死亡……可这一切都是谎言，不过都是妄想罢了，我们从来都没有真正地走向彼岸。然而，在这里……”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈紧紧握住了颤抖的拳头。{/n}“宿老告诉我们，说我们必须死亡很多次，才能找到真理。我们相信了他的话，我们一次又一次迎接死亡……可这一切都是谎言，不过都是妄想罢了，我们从来都没有真正地走向彼岸。然而，在这里……”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ballt die Fäuste, damit sie nicht zittern.{/n} "Der Wesir hat gesagt, dass wir oftmals sterben müssen, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren. Wir haben ihm geglaubt. Wir sind wieder und wieder gestorben ... Aber das war alles eine Lüge. Eine Täuschung. Wir sind niemals wirklich auf die andere Seite gegangen. Aber hier ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah ballt die Fäuste, damit sie nicht zittern.{/n} "Der Wesir hat gesagt, dass wir oftmals sterben müssen, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren. Wir haben ihm geglaubt. Wir sind wieder und wieder gestorben ... Aber das war alles eine Lüge. Eine Täuschung. Wir sind niemals wirklich auf die andere Seite gegangen. Aber hier ..."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah serre les poings pour les empêcher de trembler.{/n} « Le vizir nous a dit que nous devrions périr maintes fois pour toucher du doigt la vérité. Nous l'avons cru, et nous sommes morts à moult reprises... mais en fin de compte, c'était un mensonge. Une illusion. Nous ne sommes jamais vraiment passés de l'autre côté. Ici, en revanche... »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

Nous l'avons cru, et nous sommes morts à moult reprises... mais en fin de compte, c'était un mensonge. Une illusion. Nous ne sommes jamais vraiment passés de l'autre côté. Ici, en revanche... »

languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, titremesinler diye ellerini yumruk yapıp sıkıyor.{/n} "Vezir, hakikati öğrenmek için nice kez ölmemiz gerektiğini söylemişti. Biz de ona inandık. Defalarca öldük de öldük... Meğer hepsi yalanmış. Kuruntuya kapılmışız. Asla öteki tarafa geçmemişiz. Oysa burada..."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah clenches her fists to keep them from trembling.{/n} "The Vizsier told us that we must die many times to learn the truth. We believed him. We died again and again... But it was all a lie. A delusion. We never truly passed to the other side. But here... "
